definition: old language/the Classics/Classical Chinese as a literary model, esp. in Tang and Song prose/Classical Chinese as a school subject
Former Han dynasty study or rewriting of classical texts such as the Confucian six classics 六經|六经[Liu4 jing1]
Guwen Guanzhi, an anthology of essays written in Literary Chinese, compiled and edited by Wu Chucai and Wu Diaohou of Qing dynasty
cultural movement aspiring to study and emulate classic works, at different periods of history, esp. Tang and Song

sentences.english: Lastly, we designed coding plan of internal code of full information for mongolian information processing system.
sentences.chinese: 最后设计出了蒙古文信息处理全息内部码的编码方案。

sentences.english: In chapter two, the background of the Notes of Classical Chinese is demonstrated.
sentences.chinese: 第二章论述了《古文观止》成书的背景。

sentences.english: For me, I just pick up the kamancheh and I go back to ancient lands and history.
sentences.chinese: 对我来说，我只是将古文化捡起，我重新回归历史。

sentences.english: Ancient civilizations saw dreams as portals for receiving wisdom from the gods.
sentences.chinese: 梦在古文明中被视为是与上帝对话，获取智慧的入口。

sentences.english: We then ventured back to Ancient Culture Street.
sentences.chinese: 然后我们回到了古文化街。

sentences.english: Sources from China's distant past contain records of the sowing and harvest periods of wheat and millet.
sentences.chinese: 中国古文献曾留下有关麦和粟的播种期以及收获期。

sentences.english: China is the birthplace of world's culture in remote antiquity.
sentences.chinese: 中国是世界远古文化的发祥地。

sentences.english: China and India are both countries with ancient civilization.
sentences.chinese: 中国和印度同为世界四大古文明的发源地。

sentences.english: The chapter 4 introduces the design and implementation of Mongolian editor control.
sentences.chinese: 第四章介绍了蒙古文编辑控件的设计与实现方法。

sentences.english: They have found a kindred spirit in the ancient Chinese civilization.
sentences.chinese: 他们在中国古文明里发现了亲属般的精神。

sentences.english: There are several types of ancient characters which are popular in Buyi nationality.
sentences.chinese: 布依族中流行着几种古文字类型。

sentences.english: All the three professors have been immerged in the study of paleography for years.
sentences.chinese: 三位教授都是多年研究古文字学的业界元老。

sentences.english: The other is different thinking mode of ancient culture.
sentences.chinese: 二是与两种不同的古文化思维方式有关。

sentences.english: The role played by ancient script is irreplaceable in the development of ancient civilization.
sentences.chinese: 古文字在古代文明发展中具有不可替代的重要作用。

sentences.english: But, the relevant Mongolian automatic part-of-speech tagging studies still lack.
sentences.chinese: 而有关蒙古文自动词性标注方面的研究还欠缺。

sentences.english: During the long history of its spread, a dispute occurs as it's original or fake or written by later generation.
sentences.chinese: 该书在长期流传中出现了今古文之争和真伪之辨。

definition: Guwen Guanzhi, an anthology of essays written in Literary Chinese, compiled and edited by Wu Chucai and Wu Diaohou of Qing dynasty
to interpret and make glossaries and commentaries on classic texts
The Analects of Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]
Thousand Character Classic, 6th century poem used as a traditional reading primer
Three Character Classic, 13th century reading primer consisting of Confucian tenets in lines of 3 characters
study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries
Four Books, namely: the Great Learning 大學|大学, the Doctrine of the Mean 中庸, the Analects of Confucius 論語|论语, and Mencius 孟子

the Thirteen Confucian Classics, namely: Book of Songs 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], Book of History 尚書|尚书[Shang4 shu1], Rites of Zhou 周禮|周礼[Zhou1 li3], Rites and Ceremonies 儀禮|仪礼[Yi2 li3], Classic of Rites 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], Mr Zuo's Annals 左傳|左传[Zuo3 Zhuan4], Mr Gongyang's Annals 公羊傳|公羊传[Gong1 yang2 Zhuan4], Mr Guliang's Annals 穀梁傳|谷梁传[Gu3 liang2 Zhuan4], The Analects 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], Erya 爾雅|尔雅[Er3 ya3], Classic of Filial Piety 孝經|孝经[Xiao4 jing1], Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3]
pausing at the end of a phrase or sentence (in former times, before punctuation marks were used)/punctuation/periods and commas/sentences and phrases
